name: NEDNSSettingsManager
desc: An object you use to create and manage a DNS settings configuration.

items.name: class func shared() -> NEDNSSettingsManager
items.desc: Access the single instance of a DNS settings manager.

items.name: func loadFromPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Load your DNS settings configuration from the system networking preferences.

items.name: func saveToPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Save your DNS settings configuration to the system networking preferences.

items.name: func removeFromPreferences(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Remove your DNS settings configuration from the system networking preferences.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean you use to query the enabled state of the DNS settings configuration.

items.name: var dnsSettings: NEDNSSettings?
items.desc: An object that contains the configuration settings for a DNS server.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String?
items.desc: A string that contains the display name of the DNS settings configuration.

items.name: var onDemandRules: [NEOnDemandRule]?
items.desc: A list of ordered rules that defines the networks on which the DNS settings will apply.
